import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import{composeWithDevTools}from'redux-devtools-extension';import thunk from'redux-thunk';import{persistStore}from'redux-persist';import rootReducer from'./reducers';// Note: this API requires redux@>=3.1.0
export var store=createStore(rootReducer,{},composeWithDevTools(applyMiddleware(thunk)));export var persistor=persistStore(store);
